thread.section_title: SkyLux Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SkyLux Travel | www.skyluxtravel.com | 2 of 105
thread.title: Ms. Uta Carleno
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by Ms. Uta Carleno

author: Ms. Uta Carleno
title: Ms. Uta Carleno
text: I had a discrepancy with my ticket numbers, and when I spoke with Marc, the agent, he listened and let me finish my explanation, then he looked up my travel information and told me he will correct and update my information and he will e-mail it to me within a few minutes. He was very polite and professional and knew how to solve the problem very quickly. Within minutes I had all the correct information.
